questions.question: What is the dominant color of the displayed fabric swatch?
What is the overall texture of the fabric, based on visual inspection?
Does the fabric appear to possess a visible pattern or design?
Considering the visual details, what is the likely material?
Considering the image's resolution, what is the apparent weave or knit type?
Based solely on the image, what is the general tone or shade of the color?
Does the swatch show any noticeable sheen or glossiness?
Is there any noticeable pile or nap apparent on the surface?
Based on the visual texture, does the material seem heavy or light?
Is there any visible indication of a print, embroidery, or other embellishment?
What level of color uniformity is presented across the sample?
Does the material's color seem natural or artificially dyed?
Based on visual inspection, does the fabric appear woven or non-woven?
Is the image showing a close-up view or a wide-shot?
From visual examination, is the fabric showing any signs of wear?
